comment.author: 95271015@N00
comment._content: I think this is shot from inside Erie Basin looking at the "cut" or entrance to Erie Basin. The ship would be tied to the building now owned by Greg O'Connell, sometimes called "the Beard Street Pier" which was reduced in size by the removal of several floors.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On July 08, 2011, portside11231 suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!
